author: TravisEz13
body:
currently the test output a fixed set of text at the end of the tests.

In travis-CI, we have moved to using the -passthru object to verify test results in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/4644.

We should do something similar in the unelevated tests for consistency.  It would probably also simplify the code.
title: start-pspester -unelevate should use the passthru mechanism to verify tests pass
